attributes.action: Government to request that Chris Huhne repay £17,000.00p
attributes.additional_details: Chris Huhne Mp should pay back the amount he was given for resigning his Cabinet post. He is currently facing charges of perverting the course of justice. Should he be found not guilty, he would of course be perfectly entitled to it. However, as "we are all in this together" he should consider the impact on the public purse.
